roleset.name: (cause to) be used to

example.name: accustom-v: arg0 tends to be an inanimate cause
example.text: He started to his feet with the ready alacrity of a man whose life has accustomed him to wake at the shortest notice .

propbank.arg: to wake at the shortest notice

example.name: accustom-v: animate agent
example.text: With regular practice , he should be able to stay in the position in which you have placed him , it is only a question of practice when you can call to him and say ? dead , ? and he will lie down and stretch out in the position that you have accustomed him to taking .

example.name: accustom-v:another non-human animate arg1 with human-animate arg0
example.text: As soon as you have accustomed him to the saddle , fasten the girth .

example.name: accustomed-j: usually passive
example.text: But like other real estate professionals accustomed to California 's quake risks , Mr. Leventhal anticipates little long - term change in the city 's commercial real estate market .

roleset.note: ACCUSTOM-V NOTES: No Verbnet entry. Updated by Julia. (from accustom.01-v)
ACCUSTOMED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from accustomed.01-j)
